Sql.CDATA: CREATE OR ALTER VIEW dbo.APARTeleTransView AS SELECT p.CompanyID, 'AP' AS DataType, r.BranchID AS Branch, r.BatchNbr, p.PaymentMethodID, p.CashAccountID, ( SELECT ValueString FROM CashAccountKvExt WHERE CompanyID = ca.CompanyID AND RecordID = ca.NoteID AND FieldName = 'AttributeBKBRCODE' ) AS PayBankBranch, ca.ExtRefNbr, BranchBAccount.TaxRegistrationID AS TaxRegistrationID, p.RefNbr, p.DocType, r.DocDate, r.DocDesc, r.VendorID AS BAccountID, ( SELECT TOP (1) Value FROM CSAnswers WHERE companyid = r.CompanyID AND RefNoteID = acct.NoteID AND AttributeID IN ('TAXNBR', 'PERSONALID') ORDER BY AttributeID DESC ) AS BAccountTWID, r.CuryOrigDocAmt, r.CuryID, addr.PostalCode, c.EMail, p.UsrIsTTGenerated AS IsTTGenerated, ( CASE WHEN acct.Type LIKE 'E%' THEN ( SELECT vpm.DetailValue FROM VendorPaymentMethodDetail vpm WHERE r.CompanyID = vpm.CompanyID AND acct.BAccountID = vpm.BAccountID AND acct.DefLocationID = vpm.LocationID AND el.VPaymentMethodID = vpm.PaymentMethodID AND vpm.DetailID = 'BKACCTNAME' ) ELSE ( SELECT ValueString FROM LocationKvExt WHERE CompanyID = l.CompanyID AND RecordID = l.NoteID AND FieldName = 'AttributeBKACCTNAME' ) END ) AS AcctName, ( CASE WHEN acct.Type LIKE 'E%' THEN ( SELECT vpm.DetailValue FROM VendorPaymentMethodDetail vpm WHERE r.CompanyID = vpm.CompanyID AND acct.BAccountID = vpm.BAccountID AND acct.DefLocationID = vpm.LocationID AND el.VPaymentMethodID = vpm.PaymentMethodID AND vpm.DetailID = 'BKACCT' ) ELSE ( SELECT ValueString FROM LocationKvExt WHERE CompanyID = l.CompanyID AND RecordID = l.NoteID AND FieldName = 'AttributeBKACCT' ) END ) AS PayAccount, ( CASE WHEN acct.Type LIKE 'E%' THEN ( SELECT vpm.DetailValue FROM VendorPaymentMethodDetail vpm WHERE r.CompanyID = vpm.CompanyID AND acct.BAccountID = vpm.BAccountID AND acct.DefLocationID = vpm.LocationID AND el.VPaymentMethodID = vpm.PaymentMethodID AND vpm.DetailID = 'BKBRCODE' ) ELSE ( SELECT ValueString FROM LocationKvExt WHERE CompanyID = l.CompanyID AND RecordID = l.NoteID AND FieldName = 'AttributeBKBRCODE' ) END ) AS BankBranch FROM APPayment p INNER JOIN APRegister r ON p.CompanyID = r.CompanyID AND p.RefNbr = r.RefNbr AND p.DocType = r.DocType INNER JOIN Branch b ON p.CompanyID = b.CompanyID AND b.BranchID = r.BranchID INNER JOIN BAccount BranchBAccount ON b.CompanyID = BranchBAccount.CompanyID AND b.BAccountID = BranchBAccount.BAccountID INNER JOIN BAccount acct ON r.CompanyID = acct.CompanyID AND acct.BAccountID = r.VendorID INNER JOIN CashAccount ca ON p.CompanyID = ca.CompanyID AND p.CashAccountID = ca.CashAccountID LEFT JOIN Location l ON r.companyID = l.companyID AND r.VendorLocationID = l.LocationID LEFT JOIN Address addr ON r.CompanyID = addr.CompanyID AND l.DefAddressID = addr.AddressID LEFT JOIN Contact c ON c.CompanyID = p.CompanyID AND l.DefContactID = c.ContactID LEFT JOIN Location el ON r.CompanyID = el.CompanyID AND acct.DefLocationID = el.LocationID WHERE ( r.DocType = 'CHK' OR ( r.DocType = 'PPM' AND r.RefNbr LIKE 'PY%' ) ) AND r.Status IN ('N', 'C') UNION ALL SELECT p.CompanyID, 'AR' AS DataType, r.BranchID AS Branch, r.BatchNbr, p.PaymentMethodID, p.CashAccountID, ( SELECT ValueString FROM CashAccountKvExt WHERE CompanyID = ca.CompanyID AND RecordID = ca.NoteID AND FieldName = 'AttributeBKBRCODE' ) AS PayBankBranch, ca.ExtRefNbr, BranchBAccount.TaxRegistrationID AS TaxRegistrationID, p.RefNbr, p.DocType, r.DocDate, r.DocDesc, r.CustomerID AS BAccountID, ( SELECT TOP (1) Value FROM CSAnswers WHERE companyid = r.CompanyID AND RefNoteID = acct.NoteID AND AttributeID IN ('TAXNBR', 'PERSONALID') ORDER BY AttributeID DESC ) AS BAccountTWID, r.CuryOrigDocAmt, r.CuryID, addr.PostalCode, c.EMail, p.UsrIsTTGenerated AS IsTTGenerated, ( SELECT ValueString FROM LocationKvExt WHERE CompanyID = l.CompanyID AND RecordID = l.NoteID AND FieldName = 'AttributeBKACCTNAME' ) AS AcctName, ( SELECT ValueString FROM LocationKvExt WHERE CompanyID = l.CompanyID AND RecordID = l.NoteID AND FieldName = 'AttributeBKACCT' ) AS PayAccount, ( SELECT ValueString FROM LocationKvExt WHERE CompanyID = l.CompanyID AND RecordID = l.NoteID AND FieldName = 'AttributeBKBRCODE' ) AS BankBranch FROM ARPayment p INNER JOIN ARRegister r ON p.CompanyID = r.CompanyID AND p.RefNbr = r.RefNbr AND p.DocType = r.DocType INNER JOIN Branch b ON p.CompanyID = b.CompanyID AND b.BranchID = r.BranchID INNER JOIN BAccount BranchBAccount ON b.CompanyID = BranchBAccount.CompanyID AND b.BAccountID = BranchBAccount.BAccountID INNER JOIN BAccount acct ON r.CompanyID = acct.CompanyID AND acct.BAccountID = r.CustomerID INNER JOIN CashAccount ca ON p.CompanyID = ca.CompanyID AND p.CashAccountID = ca.CashAccountID LEFT JOIN Location l ON r.companyID = l.companyID AND r.CustomerLocationID = l.LocationID LEFT JOIN Address addr ON r.CompanyID = addr.CompanyID AND l.DefAddressID = addr.AddressID LEFT JOIN Contact c ON p.CompanyID = c.CompanyID AND l.DefContactID = c.ContactID WHERE r.DocType = 'REF' AND r.Status IN ('N', 'C')
